sentences.english: Neither the player nor the caddie was aware that the caddie was so positioned.
sentences.chinese: 這名球員或球童都沒有意識到球童所處的位置不當。

sentences.english: Neither the player nor the caddie was aware that the caddie was so positioned.
sentences.chinese: 這名球員或球童都沒有意識到球童所處的位置不當。

sentences.english: I was a ball-boy for Benfica and a great supporter of that team.
sentences.chinese: 當時我是本菲卡的球童，而且是他們忠實的球迷。

sentences.english: Good caddies do more than carry clubs and track down wayward balls.
sentences.chinese: 好的球童能做不僅僅是背球杆和追蹤打出去的球。

sentences.english: But, as Zhu Dan reports, one of the toughest jobs is for the youngsters charged with making sure the balls keep rolling.
sentences.chinese: 但是，朱丹認爲，最辛苦的還是場上揀球的球童。

sentences.english: The batter and the batboy listened to the story without batting an eyelid.
sentences.chinese: 棒球打擊手和球童都面無表情地聽着這個故事。

sentences.english: Caddies contain built-in reservoirs to help keep your plants out of the water.
sentences.chinese: 球童包含內置的水庫，以幫助保持您的植物水面。

sentences.english: Caddies should form a line facing person "Driving off".
sentences.chinese: 球童應面向客人，於球右方2至3米處站成一線。

sentences.english: You can exchange a club from your caddie.
sentences.chinese: 你可以從你的球童那兒換一根球棒。

sentences.english: The individual is considered to be a caddie.
sentences.chinese: 這個人可以被認爲是球童。

sentences.english: A player preparing to putt asks his caddie to attend the flagstick .
sentences.chinese: 一名正準備推杆的球員讓他的球童照料旗杆。
球童是球員擊球的良師益友。

sentences.english: Yes I can, but my computer can't write in chinese.
sentences.chinese: 是的，剛打完，球童給照的。你能講中文嗎？嘻嘻。

sentences.english: In Korea, you may find that most of the caddies are female.
sentences.chinese: 在韓國，您將發現大多數球童是女性。

sentences.english: You can exchange a club from your caddie.
sentences.chinese: 你可以從你的球童那裏換一根杆。

sentences.english: Besides caddying, I worked a number of jobs.
sentences.chinese: 除了做球童，我還幹過好些工作。

definition: club (golf)/cue (billiards)/also written 球桿|球杆[qiu2 gan1]
open ball (math.)/to start a ball game/to kick off (soccer)/to tee off (golf)
(ball game) enthusiast (player)/golf buddy (or tennis buddy etc)
